decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policy H8, Replacement UDP Policy 5.9. | No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.  REASON:  To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policy H8, Replacement UDP Policy 5.9.
description: Two storey side and rear extension, and extension to rear roof space
